Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
nonviolence \nonviolence\ n. The theory, doctrine, or practice of peaceful resistance to a government by fasting or refusing to cooperate.
Syn: passive resistance. [WordNet 1.5]
nonviolence n : peaceful resistance to a government by fasting or refusing to cooperate [syn: {passive resistance}, {nonviolent resistance}]
